```{r}
library(phyloseq)
library(vegan)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(data.table)
library(BiocManager)
library(microbiome)
library(knitr)
#install.packages("patchwork")
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
ps_bac= readRDS("/Users/u0145079/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-KULeuven/Desktop/PlasticDaphnia/Exposure-Niki/tables/phyloseq/decontam/ps_rare_bacteroplankton_decontam.rds")
meta= data.frame(sample_data(ps_bac))
subset_phyloseq <- subset_samples(ps_bac, Name.storage.Box=="plastic bag: Bacterioplankton De Gavers & Blauwe poort - Nikola -8/11/2021")
meta= data.frame(sample_data(subset_phyloseq))
```

```{r}
tab <-microbiome::alpha(subset_phyloseq, index = "all")
tab$Pond = meta$Pond

#Shannon
print(t.test(diversity_shannon~Pond, data=tab)) # p-value = 0.4564
#Chao1
print(t.test(chao1~Pond, data=tab)) # p-value = 0.277
```
